item.title: Creating a multi-device map with Azure IoT Central
item.description: If you use IoT Central, one of the most common dashboard that you may want to have is a map that shows where your IoT devices are. Here are 3 steps steps to get such a dashboard. 1) Add location as a capability If your devices has the capability to send its location, this should already be configured on your device template. Otherwise, you can add the following capability:
